channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox on pavement by island os flats 14 - 25 Erith Road, 27th August
item.description:
There is a dead fox in a black sack which has been there for over a week. Please can this be removed asap.

item.title: Dog waste bin overflowing, 27th August
item.description:
